<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update a user</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"patch"} path={"/v2/users/{user_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Update details about a user such as role names.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"user_id","in":"path","description":"Specifies the User ID to update.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates whether to disable or disable the user.","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"api_roles"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The new role names of the user.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

New user after modification.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** Value must match regular expression `usr_.+`"} schema={{"description":"The Vectara ID for the user.","type":"string","pattern":"usr_.+"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"email"} required={false} schemaName={"email"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The email address for the user.","type":"string","format":"email"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"username"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The username for the user.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Indicates whether the user is enabled or disabled.","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The escription for the user.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"api_roles"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** Value must match regular expression `rol_.+`"} schema={{"description":"The role names of the user.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string","pattern":"rol_.+"}}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"email\": \"user@example.com\",\n  \"username\": \"string\",\n  \"enabled\": true,\n  \"description\": \"string\",\n  \"api_roles\": [\n    \"string\"\n Permissions do not allow updating the user.
